title: Is it permissible to say 'Ameen' to an Innovated or Haram Dua
transcript: latifah from the u.s my father sometimes says dua and the dua is haram he swears by uh the prophet hassam or by the quran or asks for intercession through haram means and he's angry if i i don't say i mean you have to explain to him and if he does not understand then i think and i believe that there is no problem in faking it and pretend to say i mean but you don't say i mean
